title: G
clause_text: G.R. No.Sankirna-01/2017/C.R.11/A-2,dated 11/01/2018, as amended from time to time, shall be applicable. Uses permissible in R - 1, R - 2 Zone according to road width;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: G.R. No.Sankirna-01/2017/C.R.11/A-2,dated 11/01/2018, as amended from time to time, shall be applicable.
